75030.「ここの雰囲気 なんか おかしいですよね？\n レンダーシアの歴史を 研究しよう:
There's something strange about the atmosphere here, isn't there? I was going to research the history of
Lendersia, but I think I'd better get back to the institute before I endanger my own safety.

76210.「まさか このような不気味な場所に到着するとは\n 思いませんでした。皆さまの支:
I never thought I would arrive in such
an eerie place. Let me do what I can
to support you all. Well...<bw_break>

81549.「まさか このような不気味な場所に到着するとは\n 思いませんでした。皆さまの支:
I never thought I would arrive in such
an eerie place. Let me do what I can
to support you all.

65029.「いやはや こんな所で 船を降ろされるとは。\n グランゼドーラ王国までは 遠そ:
Well, I never thought I'd get off the ship in a place like this. It seems a long way to Gran Zedora Kingdom, so I
guess I'll start my business here. Well...

65030.「この浜辺に住む方々と お話しになりました？\n なんだか 様子がおかしいのです:
Have you spoken with the people who live on this beach? There is something wrong with them. I don't know what
happened to them, but I'm going to stay here and be supportive.

65031.「聞いてください！ 外に出たら いきなり\n とんでもない強さの魔物がいて\n:
Please listen to me! When I went outside, I was almost killed by a monster of unbelievable strength.
Traveling alone from here on out is absolutely dangerous. I, a former employee of Tavern, will spare no
effort to help you!

65032.「ちょっと 外に出てみたら\n とんでもない強さの 魔物がいて\n あやうく 殺:
I went out for a moment and found a monster of unbelievable strength and almost got me killed. Traveling alone
in the future is definitely dangerous. Please be very careful when you go there.

65033.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「世界を包み込んだ:
The white light that enveloped the world must have emanated from Lendersia. And yet the people of this
place say they've never seen it and don't know anything about it. Something is wrong. For the sake of
those who travel here, let me at least be of service. See you soon.

65034.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「世界を包み込んだ:
The white light that enveloped the world must have emanated from Lendersia. And yet, people here say
they have never seen it and don't know anything about it. That's ridiculous, isn't it?

65035.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「こんな所に来ち:
It's so sad that she came to a place like this. If it's okay with you, you can stay at my place. I don't know if
I'll make it till morning. Hehe

81550.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「こんな所に来ち:

65037.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「えっへん！ ボ:
Oh, my gosh! I've never seen such a white light! I've never seen such a white light! The others said they
didn't know either! But Hero is in Gran Zedora's castle! Here's a Josiki!

65038.「ちぇっ……。冥土のみやげに\n 教えてあげようと 思ったのになー。:
Damn. I thought I was going to teach
you as a souvenir from the underworld,
but...

65039.<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>「ここが あのコ:
Is this the Cocolata Beach? I've been to this beach before, but I never thought it would be this gloomy.
There's a big barrier called the Three Way Gate to the east of the beach. You can get to Gran Zedora from there, but
you'd better be careful and prepared before you go.

65042.「まもなく グランドタイタス号は\n レンドア島へ向けて 出発いたします。\n:
The Grand Titus will soon depart for
Lendor Island. Would you like to board
the Grand Titus?<yesno><break>

65043.「レンドア島までの乗船料は 不要です。\n お戻りになりたい時は\n いつでも:
There is no charge for the boat ride to Lendor Island. If you wish to return to Lendor Island, just let me
know and I will be happy to assist you.

65044.「かしこまりました。\n では こちらの舟で グランドタイタス号まで\n お送り:
Yes, sir. Then I will take you back to
the Grand Titus in my boat. Please.

70258.<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>「あんた 三門の:
Did you go to the Three Way Gate? Then why did you come back here when you could have gone to Gran Zedora? What?
The gate to Gran Zedora was closed! So you can't go to Gran Zedora Kingdom by land? This is a problem.

70259.<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>「グランゼドーラ:
I can't believe the gates to Gran Zedora are closed. That means we can't even reach Gran Zedora Kingdom by
land. What in the world is going on in Gran Zedora Kingdom if you can't get there by boat or on foot?

75037.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「キャハハハハ！:
Cahahahaha! Hey, hey, you know what? Everyone who lives here is a fake human! That's why we have no choice
but to live! What's the point of fake humans living on true swords? Our pleasure is to see the misfortunes of
the humans who have washed up here!

75038.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「ふふんっ！ ボ:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>I know! I know! Hero is dead, so this
world is finished.

75039.<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>「なんか ここの:
I heard that the people who live here are fake humans, but I have no idea what they are talking about. How is
that possible? Hero is dead, and what the hell is going on in Lendersia?
